products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, their oslo blackout black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their oslo blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. 
 
At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.productdescription: The blackest of blacks, the palermo (blackout) black is not for shy and retiring rooms. This is a blind that wants to stand out and be noticed, and noticed it certainly will be! With the latest blackout technology, this blind is a must for a night-time feel all day long. Create a moody focal point in a home office or dining room by adding the palermo black to a monochrome colour scheme, and accessorise with bright red or hot fuchsia if you can't resist a little colour.

products.title: Black (3009) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure black (3009) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.
